subject: Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Barbaro (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Instead of the Preakness, trainer Michael Matz said the colt would run in the Barbaro Stakes, which is part of the undercard at Pimlico Race Course.
snippet: Instead of the Preakness, trainer Michael Matz said the colt would run in the Barbaro Stakes, which is part of the undercard at Pimlico Race Course.
